Detailed Description

A validator for integer values.

This class provides a validator that ensures a string contains a valid integer within a specified range.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum TValueValidator::EValidateResult [inherited]

Enumerator:
VR_BAD  means that validation has failed.
VR_OK  means that validation has passed.
VR_FIXED  means that validated value has corrected automatically during validation.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TIntValidator::TIntValidator ( int  minimum = INT_MIN,
int  maximum = INT_MAX,
QObject *  parent = 0 
)

Constructor.

Parameters:
minimum is the minimum allowed value, INT_MIN by default.
maximum is the maximum allowed value, INT_MAX by default.

Member Function Documentation

virtual EValidateResult TIntValidator::checkValue ( QVariant &  value  )  [virtual]

Validates a "value" normally passed from item editor. If the value is lower than "minimum", it will be fixed to "minimum". If the value is greater than "maximum", it will be fixed to "maximum". If the value is not integer, the validation will fail.

See also:
minimum(), maximum()

Implements TValueValidator.
